text: moosa ne kaha khuda zaroor pharamaata hai ki vah gaay na to itanee sadhaee ho ki zameen jote na khetee seechen bhalee changee ek rang kee ki usamen koee dhabba tak na ho, vah bole ab (ja ke) theek-theek bayaan kiya, garaz un logon ne vah gaay halaal kee haalaanki unase ummeed na thee vah ki vah aisa karenge
